statements: DELETE FROM FacultyInfo WHERE faculty_id = 101 AND research_activities LIKE '%data analytics%';
DELETE FROM FacultyInfo WHERE qualifications LIKE '%PhD%' AND teaching_assignments = 'Computer Science';
DELETE FROM FacultyInfo WHERE name = 'John Doe' AND (teaching_assignments = 'Mathematics' OR research_activities LIKE '%AI%');
DELETE FROM faculty_qualifications WHERE faculty_id = 1 AND degree = 'PhD';
DELETE FROM faculty_assignments WHERE department = 'Computer Science' AND teaching_hours > 30;
DELETE FROM teaching_assignments WHERE faculty_id = 101 AND year = 2022;
DELETE FROM research_activities WHERE faculty_id = 201 AND date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM teaching_assignments WHERE faculty_id = 2 AND course_code = 'CS101';
DELETE FROM teaching_assignments WHERE faculty_id = 2 AND course_code = 'CS101' AND semester = 'Spring';
DELETE FROM research_activities WHERE project_title = 'Data Science Project';
